BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Vector.head
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.tail
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.last
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.init
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.select
BlackBox.comment:
select :: (CmpNat (i + s) (s * n) ~ GT) -- ARG[0]
            => SNat f                        -- ARG[1]
            -> SNat s                        -- ARG[2]
            -> SNat n                        -- ARG[3]
            -> Vec i a                       -- ARG[4]
            -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Vector.concat
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.splitAt
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.unconcat
BlackBox.comment:
unconcat :: KnownNat n     -- ARG[0]
              => SNat m         -- ARG[1]
              -> Vec (n * m) a  -- ARG[2]
              -> Vec n (Vec m a)

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Vector.merge
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.map
BlackBox.templateD:
wire ~SIGD[~SYM[1]][1];
assign ~SYM[1] = ~ARG[1];

genvar ~SYM[2];

generate
  for (~SYM[2]=0; ~SYM[2] < $size(~RESULT); ~SYM[2] = ~SYM[2] + 1) begin : map_~SYM[3]
    ~INST 0
      ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT[~SYM[2]]~ ~TYPEL[~TYPO]~
      ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[1][~SYM[2]]~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[1]]~
    ~INST
  end
endgenerate

CLaSH.Sized.Vector.replace_integer
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.reverse
CLaSH.Sized.Vector.concatBitVector#
BlackBox.comment:
concatBitVector# :: KnownNat m           -- ARG[0]
                        => Vec n (BitVector m)  -- ARG[1]
                        -> BitVector (n * m)

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Vector.unconcatBitVector#
BlackBox.comment:
unconcatBitVector# :: (KnownNat n, KnownNat m) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
                          => BitVector (n * m)        -- ARG[2]
                          -> Vec n (BitVector m)
